title: Workshop on Inquiry-Based Digital Learning Design Tool Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design knowledge based on secondary social studies teaching experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, targeting learners with social studies subject-matter expertise.

learning_goals: Learners can operationalize an inquiry-based lesson design process into three or more stages using digital tools
Learners can improve the pedagogical validity of lesson designs by over 80% through a peer feedback system
Learners can select five or more digital resources required for actual instruction by applying technology-pedagogical integration principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
